adHeader: Pet sitter (live-in) Elder Care, dogs, cats & House Sit 4 U
adDetails: I am an experienced CAREgiver, Dog Sitter, House sitter & pet-sitter available for your place if you need to travel out of the SF Bay Area. GREAT REFERENCES for a solid, locally-based gentleman who can housetrain pets, provide special meds care for seniors, alzheimers or dementia care. Contact me to discuss your needs. I look forward to discussing your specific needs soon. The best care FOR your loved ones ;-)
